definition: to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in

sentences.english: Garden Cottages are a favorite of brides for their wedding night.
sentences.chinese: 花園的別墅是他們的新婚之夜新娘最喜愛的一種。

sentences.english: He had offered the loan of his small villa at Cap Ferrat.
sentences.chinese: 他願意借出在費拉角的小別墅。

sentences.english: Soon, the villa came the dull sound of dogs barking a few.
sentences.chinese: 不一會兒，別墅裏傳出數聲沉悶的狗叫聲。

sentences.english: Some of Guling's older villas have now been redesignated as museums or shrines.
sentences.chinese: 牯嶺的一些老別墅如今被重新設計成博物館或神殿。

sentences.english: Hopson Dongjiao Villa, Cross the Longdong Avenue , .
sentences.chinese: 合生東郊別墅，縱橫龍東大道。

sentences.english: We found the poster on a partition door in the Villa of the East Garden.
sentences.chinese: 在東園別墅的一道隔扇門上，我們找到了那張捷報。

sentences.english: " he then rented it out and moved to Cape Town.
sentences.chinese: ，他將這棟別墅租賃出去後搬到了開普敦。

sentences.english: The seaside villa, it is a blessing for people place to live.
sentences.chinese: 海邊別墅，那是有福之人住的地方。

sentences.english: Formally the house seeks to be a solid with the least possible subtractions.
sentences.chinese: 形式上別墅力圖成爲一個削減最少的立方體。

sentences.english: We call the double height space "the soul of the house".
sentences.chinese: 我們將雙高空間稱爲“別墅的靈魂”。

sentences.english: The landlords who live in mansions want to have their lands returned.
sentences.chinese: 生活在別墅裏的地主們要求歸還他們的土地。

sentences.english: Han Jia, who are living in these villas?
sentences.chinese: 韓佳，這些別墅裏住的是什麼人？

sentences.english: He spared no expense in building a villa for himself.
sentences.chinese: 他不惜工本爲自己造了一幢別墅。

sentences.english: This project is located at Da Maysa, Shenzhen, which is aimed to be a luxurious villa development.
sentences.chinese: 項目位於深圳大梅沙，是一個高端定位的別墅區。

sentences.english: It is a small villa with a large garden.
sentences.chinese: 老師的家是個小別墅，座落在一個大花園裏。

sentences.english: I want to build myself a country house.
sentences.chinese: 我想給自己建一座鄉間別墅。

definition: building (a relatively large, multi-storey one)/CL:幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
a building of two or more stories/CL:棟|栋[dong4],幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
top floor/the top of a building
to build/to construct/to ram/to hit/Taiwan pr. [zhu2]
to decorate/interior decoration/to fit up/to renovate
